name: Tennis Court
description:
This is a simple prototype of tennis vs AI, the match is 3 Mins. A lot of improvements are needed

Controls

Left/A : Move Left

Right/D : Move Right

Left Click : Hit ball on your left side

Right Click : Hit ball on your right side

C : Perspective

Credits

@Renderbydavid | Code, Modeling, Animation

@Aten | Footsteps

Freesound.org | Music, Sfx
